items.title: Apple introduces Creator Studio, a subscription bundle of its best creative apps
items.summary: Today Apple is introducing a new app bundle. It's called Creator Studio and for a fixed monthly or yearly fee, you get access to a bunch of creative apps: Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro on Macs and iPads, as well as Motion, Compressor, and MainStage on Macs. There are also intelligentâ€¦

An official Asus listing in the region has shown off a new laptop with the Ryzen AI 7 445 inside set to drop in just aâ€¦

items.title: Scotland's Jones to join Toulon from Glasgow in summer
items.summary: Scotland centre Huw Jones is to leave Glasgow Warriors to join French Top 14 club Toulon at the end of the current season.

items.title: Meta is closing down three VR studios as part of its metaverse cuts
items.summary: Marvelâ€™s Deadpool VR. Meta is laying off about 10 percent of its Reality Labs metaverse division, and the cuts include closing down some of its VR gaming studios. Twisted Pixel Games, the developer of Marvel's Deadpool VR, Sanzaru Games, the developer of the Asgard's Wrath franchise, and Armature Sâ€¦

items.title: Deepseek research touts memory breakthrough, decoupling compute power and RAM pools to bypass GPU & HBM constraints â€” Engram conditional memory module commits static knowledge to system RAM
items.summary: A new Deepseek whitepaper has outlined a new form of long-term memory for AI models, named Engram. Engram-based models are more performant than their MoE counterparts, and decouple compute power from system RAM pools to improve results.

items.title: Lego Smart Brick: watch an immersive 15-minute demo like youâ€™re right there with us at CES
items.summary: Sean Hollister demos the Lego Smart Brick at CES. The Lego Smart Brick won our Best in Show award at CES 2026, and it was no wonder after watching Lego designer Maarten Simons' expert demo there. So I thought: why not let you virtually attend the same tech demo I did? Before I left Las Vegas, I snuâ€¦

items.title: Chelsea and Scotland legend McCreadie dies aged 85
items.summary: Former Scotland and Chelsea player Eddie McCreadie, who was once hailed by Tommy Docherty as the best left-back in Europe and went on to manage the London club, dies at the age of 85.
